title: Federal Hall National Memorial: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees and Passes         Close-up of the statue of George Washington that stands on the front steps of Federal Hall. NPS  There is no fee to enter Federal Hall National Memorial. Enjoy your visit! If you plan to visit other parks that charge an entrance fee, learn more about obtaining a national park pass from the America the Beautiful - National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass series and learn about special days when park entrance fees are waived - Fee-Free Days in the National Parks.
